description.en:
Geographical coverage

Indicate the countries and/or regions for which this resource is more appropriate
Provide some keywords that describe the topic of this resource

Internal structure of resource

atomic: a single individual resource
collection: set of resources with no specified relationships
networked: set of resources with unspecified relationships
hierarchical: set of resources with tree structure relationships
linear: set of resources with "previous"/"next" relationships.

description.en:
Level of granularity

(These are the element values; the numbers in the parentheses should be stored instead of these values when each one is selected)
raw media / resource files (1)
lesson (2)
course (3)
educational program (4)

Status of development

Is this the final version of the resource?

Specific technology/software

Select if the resource needs some particular operating system or browser to be accessed

Highest possible version

File format

What format is the resource in? Is it a word document, a picture or a video?
Is this resource causing some interaction from the learner's side? Is it partly inducing actions from the learner?
Describe any installation needed

Information Density

Estimate the density of the information within the resource

Level of interaction

What is the interactivity level between the resource and its users? Ranging from very low, low and medium to high and very high
If played at the intended speed, how long would the resource take to view/follow/listen? Use "H", "M" and "S" to approximately (PT) indicate hours, minutes and seconds e.g. PT1H30M or PT1M50S
How difficult is it to work with this resource?
The typical time that it should take this resource when taught to a typical audience
Describe any other technical requirements
The human language(s) used by the typical intended user of this learning object.

description.sv: Denna formuletten används som bas i många sammansatta formuletter som default. Formuletten består av en fråga med endast en basvariabel samt en minimal formulärspecifikation. Om denna basformulett inte är laddad (egentligen den omgivande formulett mängden) så kommer många sammansatta formuletter inte att fungera.
description.en: This is the formlet used as base in compound formlets by default. The formlets consists of a query with only a base variable and a minimal form specification. If the base formlet is not loaded (i.e. the containing formlet set) many compound formlets will break.

label.sv: Default formulet bas i sammansatta formuletter
label.en: Default Base formlet in compound formlets
